resources.string:
HabariHub is a work in progress, please report all bugs and suggestion to damas@tanzoft.com
DISCLAIMER
1.Tanzoft is not affiliated to any news source used in this app
2.Use it at your own risk, this app is in alpha development stage
3.Tanzoft will remove any news source if asked to by authorities
PayPal donations do not grant any upgrade or improvements, they just support developer work. App will remain free without donations

Habari Hub is a lightweight app created to integrate all Tanzania news sources into one hub. It is meant to be lightweight and fast to meet the need of low bandwidth in our developing nation. Any contribution is welcomed through the following channels

Thank you for being part of this app, as of now this app is in early development stages. Timeline for this app is as follows:
1st June 2013 \- Alpha Release
1st July 2013 \- Beta Release
1st August 2013 \- Final Release.
Almost everything right now is in webView but we are working hard to bring everything native.
